Gayle and I had the honor of meeting Ruthie Bolton, who now stands shoulder to shoulder with Lucy Harris in the Women‚Äôs Basketball Hall of Fame. As we celebrate Black History Month, I am immensely proud to honor both of these stars. 

#WickerReport 

https://t.co/CN48pK1X8Q

Few people have had such an impact on sports as Lusia Harris, paving the way for other women like Ruthie Bolton. As we celebrate Black History Month, our state can take immense pride in these two outstanding daughters of Mississippi. 

#WickerReport

https://t.co/CN48pJKmhi

See more on the #RETURNact here.

to have you stop by! https://t.co/In8YlEnm31

Hiram Rhodes Revels became the first African American to serve in Congress when he was sworn in as a U.S. Senator for Mississippi in 1870. 

Senator Revels later returned to Mississippi, serving as president of Alcorn Agriculture and Mechanical College. 

#MississippiMonday https://t.co/LQpwhjK5SU
